snippet: Mr. Blankley served as Newt Gingrich’s press secretary during his rise to power in the House; he later became a columnist and editorial page editor at The Washington Times.
abstract: Tony Blankley, press secretary to Newt Gingrich during his rise to power in the House and who later became a columnist, dies at age 62.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Blankley served as Newt Gingrich’s press secretary during his rise to power in the House; he later became a columnist and editorial page editor at The Washington Times.

headline.main: Tony Blankley, Gingrich Aide and Columnist, Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Tony Blankley, Gingrich Aide and Columnist, Dies at 62
